items.title: Get Google's Night Sight on your Phone.
items.summary: Google in a launch event on October 9 announced its third generation Pixel devices. Google Pixel is well known for having the best camera in the world of smartphones. They can take amazing Portrait photos and low light photos. In the launch, even Google announced…
items.content_html:
Google in a launch event on October 9 announced its third generation Pixel devices. Google Pixel is well known for having the best camera in the world of smartphones. They can take amazing Portrait photos and low light photos. In the launch, even Google announced about the feature Night Sight for its camera which will take amazing quality photos in low light. The feature is exclusive for pixel phones. But as always developer Arnova ported it for other phones as well.

How to Get Night sight working on your phone?

  1. Check if camera2API is enabled on your phone.
    1. Install manual camera compatibility app from Play store.
    2. If all the tests are passed then you are good to go.
    3. If your phone fails to pass all the tests then you need to root your phone to enable camera2API.
  2. Download Google camera 6.1 port by Arnova. (Link)
  3. After installing the app give all the necessary permissions.
  4. You will see a horizontal scrollable menu, Night sight will be under more section.

The photos taken take some time to process and since google camera 6.1 port is still under work, not all the options are working on all the phones. The night sight pictures take some to shoot and you have to hold it still for some time.

The results are really promising. No other camera app can shoot such good photos in low light. The camera happens to enhance colours in the picture and makes it look like the picture has been taken under normal lighting conditions.

Note: The picture below are shot on Redmi Note 5 with Google camera 5.3 and Google camera 6.1(with Night sight).

Google Camera 5.3

Google Camera 6.1(with Night Sight)

items.title: Youtube was down for an hour and Now it's back
items.summary: I woke up this morning to notice something unusual, YOUTUBE WAS DOWN. Yes you read it right, youtube was down for more than half an hour and users worldwide are affected by this outage. Users round the globe started reporting that the popular video streaming…
items.content_html:
I woke up this morning to notice something unusual, YOUTUBE WAS DOWN. Yes you read it right, youtube was down for more than half an hour and users worldwide are affected by this outage. Users round the globe started reporting that the popular video streaming service youtube wasn't responding to their requests. Both youtube website and the app was down. Even the youtube music streaming service faced the outage.

Never seen YouTube down for 30+ minutes like this before üëÄ

‚Äî Marques Brownlee (@MKBHD) October 17, 2018

Thanks for your reports about YouTube, YouTube TV and YouTube Music access issues. We're working on resolving this and will let you know once fixed. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and will keep you updated.

‚Äî Team YouTube (@TeamYouTube) October 17, 2018

items.title: Now enable Snapchat Alpha without Root
items.summary: Snapchat is working on a major redesign for its app and also emphasising on speed. The alpha version was enabled in September by tweaking the app for rooted users. Now with the latest update, you can try Snapchat Alpha on your phone. All you need…
items.content_html:
Snapchat is working on a major redesign for its app and also emphasising on speed. The alpha version was enabled in September by tweaking the app for rooted users.
Now with the latest update, you can try Snapchat Alpha on your phone. All you need to do is open Snapmap and visit Bermuda.


This method works if you are using the latest version of Snapchat (i.e Version 10.42.0.0). Just follow these simple steps to try out Snapchat Alpha:

  • Pinch on the Snapchat viewfinder to zoom out and open the SnapMap.
  • Tap Search in the top left and type ‚ÄúBermuda.‚Äù Select the first result.
  • Once you find Bermuda you will see a winking ghost on the island.
  • Tap the ghost and you will see a prompt to enter the Alpha.
  • The app will restart and you‚Äôll be using the Alpha.


The alpha version of the app is faster when compared to the stable version of the app. Since it is still under development features like voice and video calling and snapcodes are missing. The app has a redesigned messaging UI and Profile. To get back to the stable version of the app just go to settings and disable it.

items.title: Download Google Pixel 3 Live Wallpapers Ported for Android 6.0+
items.summary: With the Google Pixel launch event scheduled ahead on October 9, many things started to leak out including the alleged Pixel 3 and Pixel 3 XL. And recently XDA developer Pranav Pandey ported the Pixel 3's live wallpapers. Pranav Pandey has also ported the Pixel…
items.content_html:
With the Google Pixel launch event scheduled ahead on October 9, many things started to leak out including the alleged Pixel 3 and Pixel 3 XL. And recently XDA developer Pranav Pandey ported the Pixel 3's live wallpapers.
Pranav Pandey has also ported the Pixel 2's live wallpapers to Android 6.0+.

There are 28 total wallpapers divided into two groups: ‚ÄúCome Alive‚Äù and ‚ÄúLiving Universe.‚Äù There are 5 sets of wallpapers in the ‚ÄúComing Alive‚Äù group:

  • Bloom Cloud, Bloom Sky, Bloom Sunrise
  • Bubble Up Lemon, Bubble Up Peach, Bubble Up Plum
  • Burst Dusk, Burst Forest, Burst Midnight
  • Groove After Dark, Groove Chill, Groove Party
  • Pixie Cobalt, Pixie Emerald, Pixie Periwinkle

There are 4 sets of new wallpapers in the ‚ÄúLiving Universe‚Äù group:

  • Bird‚Äôs-Eye View, Zion National Park
  • Light the Way, Schwyz
  • White Sands, Sonoran Desert
  • Tropical Voyage, Malolo Barrier Reef

Download Pixel 3 Live wallpapers

If you are currently using a device which runs on Android 6.0 Marshmallow or any higher Android version including Android 7.0 Nougat, Android 8.0 Oreo and Android 9.0 Pie, you can install the ported app on your phone.

The developer had divided the wallpaper port into two versions: one for Android 6.0-Android 7.1 and the other for Android 8.0 - Android 8.1. If your device is running on Android 9.0 Pie then you can direclty sildeload the official APK file. The download links for the app are listed below.

You need to have Google wallpaper app install on your phone inorder to apply these ported live wallpapers. You can Install Google live wallapapers directly from the Play Store.

DOWNLOAD

Download Google Pixel 3 Live Wallpapers for Android 6.0-Android 7.1
Download Google Pixel 3 Live Wallpapers for Android 8.0-Android 8.1
Download Google Pixel 3 Live Wallpapers for Android 9 Pie devices

items.title: Walls are no more a thing of Privacy
items.summary: There is no such thing called privacy in this digital age. We killed privacy in our virtual environment (The Internet). Now researchers at MIT came up with an Artificial intelligence algorithm which can see through walls. This algorithm generates a stick figure of the human on…
items.content_html:
There is no such thing called privacy in this digital age. We killed privacy in our virtual environment (The Internet). Now researchers at MIT came up with an Artificial intelligence algorithm which can see through walls.

Privacy Is Completely And Utterly Dead, And We Killed It -Forbes

This algorithm generates a stick figure of the human on the other side of the wall. This technology, dubbed RF-Pose makes use of the wifi radio signals, bounces them through the walls and through people on the other side of the wall and analyze the patterns as they come back and create a bare-bones stick figure that matches the person‚Äôs pose and movements. It‚Äôs like how a bat sees by echolocation, except the ‚Äúimage‚Äù rendered in its head is a childish drawing.

The 2D image produced does not have a head, So if the system has never seen you before, it won‚Äôt know who you are. But after 100 participants trained the system, it could correctly identify which researchers were which 83 percent of the time, based on ‚Äútheir style of moving,‚Äù the researchers write.

items.title: Google lens showed up on Redmi Note 5
items.summary: I was recently using Google Assistant and I have observed that Google Lens is enabled on my phone (Redmi Note 5). My phone is running MIUI 9.5 and Android Nougat. I am not sure if this is going to stay on my phone because I…
items.content_html:
I was recently using Google Assistant and I have observed that Google Lens is enabled on my phone (Redmi Note 5). My phone is running MIUI 9.5 and Android Nougat.


I am not sure if this is going to stay on my phone because I don't think it's an intentional rollout as Google lens standalone app which is available on play store is still not compatible with my phone. The new design of Google lens was rolled out to phones recently. Google lens can currently detect Text, Products, Books, Media, Places, Barcodes.


Comment below if Google Lens is enabled on your phone. This article will be updated with further information when available. Also, subscribe to the notifications to get notified when this article is updated.

items.title: Hands-on Lawnchair v2 pre alpha
items.summary:
Lawnchair is a launcher based on Pixel Launcher and it was under development for almost a year now, The stable version was just released. Lawnchair developer David sn posted a picture of Lawnchair v2 and informed us that Lawnchair is going to get a prealpha soon and now the time has come. I got a chance to try version 2 of the app and i am pretty amazed.

While Lawnchair v1 look more like the older versions of pixel launcher, version 2 looks like the latest pixel launcher with a lot of customization options. The beta version is going to be available to masses in two weeks.

You can find the following sections in the settings page of the launcher

  • Theme
  • Desktop
  • Dock
  • App drawer
  • Backups

The options in the settings are pretty much the same as v1.
items.content_html:
Lawnchair is a launcher based on Pixel Launcher and it was under development for almost a year now, The stable version was just released. Lawnchair developer David sn posted a picture of Lawnchair v2 and informed us that Lawnchair is going to get a prealpha soon and now the time has come. I got a chance to try version 2 of the app and i am pretty amazed.

While Lawnchair v1 look more like the older versions of pixel launcher, version 2 looks like the latest pixel launcher with a lot of customization options. The beta version is going to be available to masses in two weeks.

You can find the following sections in the settings page of the launcher

  • Theme
  • Desktop
  • Dock
  • App drawer
  • Backups

The options in the settings are pretty much the same as v1.

Theme

Under this section you will find options select the icon pack and also the Launcher theme. In v1 of the app the themes were limited to Light, Dark and Black. In v2 we have Auto, Auto (with OLED black), Light, Light (with dark text), Dark, Dark (with OLED black). And this section also has the Blur option which blurs few elements like the dock and the search bar.

Desktop

At A Glance feature is added to the Desktop sections (users can disable it if the want to). At A Glance widget by default shows Day, Month and date but users can customize it to show only time or only date or both time and date. Changing grid size and icon size is also under this section.

Dock

Four Dock styles are added to this section. We have Rounded, Gradient(white gradient), Flat, Transparent. The search bar can also be added to the dock.

App drawer

App drawer now has Display app suggestions option which shows the most used apps on the top of the app drawer.

The app is still under development. I have used this launcher for a day now and the only issue I found is that the app drawer scroll is not smooth as expected. The app is buggy at the moment. Join the public beta that is going to be released two weeks from now and help the developers to fix the issues.

DOWNLOAD LAWNCHAIR V2 ALPHA

items.title: Lawnchair v1 stable released
items.summary: Lawnchair is a launcher based on Pixel Launcher v1 and it was under development for almost a year now and it's stable version is finally released. Lawnchair launcher includes many features which are exclusive for pixel launcher and it is similar to the Rootless Pixel…
items.content_html:
Lawnchair is a launcher based on Pixel Launcher v1 and it was under development for almost a year now and it's stable version is finally released.

Lawnchair launcher includes many features which are exclusive for pixel launcher and it is similar to the Rootless Pixel launcher. Lawnchair is a separate application under a different package name with features ported from Pixel Launcher. The first version of Lawnchair showed up on XDA and then a public beta was released to Playstore later.

Lawnchair stable V1 features

    • Google Now integration (Requires the Lawnfeed add-on app)

    • Android Oreo shortcuts and notification dots

    • Icon Pack support‚ÄÉ

    • Variable Icon Size‚ÄÉ

    • Custom Grid Size‚ÄÉ

    • Dock Customization‚ÄÉ

    • Adaptive Icons (For Nougat & above)‚ÄÉ

    • BLUUUUUR (Optional Blurry UI for pretty much everything)

      DOWNLOAD ON GOOGLE PLAY

items.title: Xiaomi starts recruiting beta testers for MIUI 10
items.summary: Xiaomi announced about the global beta launch of it OS MIUI on Thursday and also released the list of supported devices which are eligible for this beta update. MIUI 10 comes with few improvements in its performance, a whole new UI which aims to look…
items.content_html:
Xiaomi announced about the global beta launch of it OS MIUI on Thursday and also released the list of supported devices which are eligible for this beta update. MIUI 10 comes with few improvements in its performance, a whole new UI which aims to look good on devices with 18:9 aspect ration screens and also has AI portrait that works pretty good with both single and dual camera setup.

Xiaomi had posted in it's forum about the beta tester program for MIUI 10 and the application is already open. This beta tester program is limited to few devices and Xiaomi aims to release it to more devices in near future. The last date to apply for this beta tester program is 11th of June and applied users will be informed about there selection status on 12th june via PM.

Recruitment Requirements

1. Region: All Regions

2. Communication Language: English
3. Communication Tool: QQ (It is a must, no other alternative tool)
4. Devices: Mi 6, Mi MIX 2, Mi MIX 2S, Redmi S2, Redmi Note 5 Pro (India)/Redmi Note 5 (Note: More devices will get MIUI 10 soon, please stay tuned here.)
5. Other Requirements:
- Must be using latest MIUI Global Beta ROM
- Should have interest to test and some knowledge about ROMs, Bootloader Unlocking and Flashing MIUI ROMs
- Must be active on the forum
- Willing to discuss with other members of both QQ Beta group and forum
Application Procedures
If you are viewing this thread with MIUI Global Forum App on your device, please click here and skip to step 2, otherwise please follow the steps below to apply.
Step 1:
Download MIUI Global Forum app
MIUI Forum app is the first and only app to access MIUI Global Forum where you can discover latest news and updates of MIUI ROM, Mi products, apps, themes, reviews, root tools, kernels, tutorials and more.
1) Download APK
MIUIForum2.0.2.apk (18.53 MB, Downloads: 9373)

2) Or get it on Google Play
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.miui.enbbs
Step 2:
On the homepage, select Recruitment. Fill out your information as stated. Click the Submit button. We will send you a forum PM for approval.

items.title: Meet Norman "World's first psychopath AI"
items.summary: Eversince AI came into existance, there were arguments if AI can go out of control or show undesired behaviour. Many tech enterprenuers including Facebook CEO Mark Zukerberg and Tesla CEO Elon musk were a part of these arguments. MIT researchers created an AI algorithm named…
items.content_html:
Eversince AI came into existance, there were arguments if AI can go out of control or show undesired behaviour. Many tech enterprenuers including Facebook CEO Mark Zukerberg and Tesla CEO Elon musk were a part of these arguments.

MIT researchers created an AI algorithm named Norman that thinks of nothing but murder. Norman is born from the fact that the data that is used to teach a machine learning algorithm can significantly influence its behavior. Norman was created to caption images. Norman is a proof that AI program can show undesired behaviour not only because of it's algorithm but also because of the data fed to it. The data fed to Norman was from "darkest corners of Reddit". The results were also compared with a standard image captioning neural network.

Here is what both AIs see on Rorschach's inkblot tests.

This test on AI puts forward a serious threat to humans if wrong data is fed to AI. Comment your opinion below.

Source: http://norman-ai.mit.edu/
